actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the rules concerning the unconventional fuels credit with respect to gas produced from a tight formation, and to restore the application of such credit to the alternative minimum tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to apply the income tax credit for producing fuel from a nonconventional source to natural gas found in tight sands formations. Applies the nonconventional fuels tax credit to alternative minimum tax calculations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the rules concerning the unconventional fuels credit with respect to gas produced from a tight formation, and to restore the application of such credit to the alternative minimum tax.
